news_items.title: Christmas bin collection dates and recycling centre opening times
news_items.description: We are reminding residents to check their bin collection days over the festive period. Due to the bank holidays over Christmas and New Year, there will be changes to the usual collection schedule.

news_items.title: Soup kitchen festive opening times
news_items.description: There are a number of soup kitchens open over the festive period, offering a warm drink and a meal. Further information can be found on our 'help with food' page found on the link below.

news_items.title: Work in local government
news_items.description: Help to make your community a safer, healthier and happier place to live and work, with a career that offers great benefits, support and flexible working. You can really make a difference when you start a career with a council, and there are hundreds of varied and surprising roles to choose from.

news_items.title: Financial help and support
news_items.description: With so many forms, rules and systems it can be difficult to know where to begin, but there is free, confidential advice available which is easily accessed and can help make a difference.
